article_title: Why health plan enrollees want to scream
article_text:
Even if he makes a good income, he may be having problems with medical bills.

When regulators were starting to set up the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (PPACA) public exchange system, most consumer groups talked about how wonderful coverage expansion would be.

The Henry J. Kaiser Family Foundation had analysts look hard at the PPACA plan design rules in 2011 and found that the deductibles for holders of typical bronze plan holders might range from $2,750 to $6,350.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Allison Bell
article_metadata.description: They can buy coverage on a guaranteed-issue basis, but deductibles aren't getting any smaller.

og.description: They can buy coverage on a guaranteed-issue basis, but deductibles aren't getting any smaller.

article_summary:
The Henry J. Kaiser Family Foundation had analysts look hard at the PPACA plan design rules in 2011 and found that the deductibles for holders of typical bronze plan holders might range from $2,750 to $6,350.
When regulators were starting to set up the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (PPACA) public exchange system, most consumer groups talked about how wonderful coverage expansion would be.
Even if he makes a good income, he may be having problems with medical bills.
